title: Evaluation of thickness of individual macular retinal layers in diabetic eyes from optical coherence tomography
details: J Shah, B Tan, D Wong, NFB Abdul Gani, Q Hu, X Liu… - Scientific Reports, 2024
abstract: The effect of diabetes mellitus (DM) on individual retinal layers remains incompletely understood. We evaluated the intra-retinal layer thickness alterations in 71 DM eyes with no diabetic retinopathy (DR), 90 with mild DR, and 63 with moderate DR without …

title: An Empirical Analysis of Compute-Optimal Inference for Problem-Solving with Language Models
details: Y Wu, Z Sun, S Li, S Welleck, Y Yang - arXiv preprint arXiv:2408.00724, 2024
abstract: The optimal training configurations of large language models (LLMs) with respect to model sizes and compute budgets have been extensively studied. But how to optimally configure LLMs during inference has not been explored in sufficient depth …

title: StructEval: Deepen and Broaden Large Language Model Assessment via Structured Evaluation
details: B Cao, M Ren, H Lin, X Han, F Zhang, J Zhan, L Sun - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2024
abstract: Evaluation is the baton for the development of large language models. Current evaluations typically employ a single-item assessment paradigm for each atomic test objective, which struggles to discern whether a model genuinely possesses the …
